contentList.content: Shades are exiles, scions of a forbidden art too dangerous to be tolerated. They haunt the nights, moving through shadows with agility to murder their target, their gift allowing them to blend into the dark as if it was themselves. They are fleet-footed death, come to claim the blood of the living.

An artisan of shadows, Umbral Blades are the true heir of Shades. They blink in and out of foe's reach, at each movement another deadly cut. They are lurking in the dark, unseen, untouchable, waiting for the proper moment to unleash their murderous expertise.

They have become the hand of Khaela Mensha Khaine out of pure devotion and faith. They fight with a blade in each hand, slicing through their opponent's flesh, dancing through the spilling guts and streams of blood, relishing the feeling of true terror they inspire. Only long afterwards do they look back and see the trail of death in their wake.
The residual shadow of the Umbral Blade.
An entity of pure shadow without physical presence.
You dodge light and blend into obscurity, gaining <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFILTRATE_300001">Infiltrated</LSTag> for [1] turns.
You dodge light and blend into obscurity, gaining <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHIMMER_STRIKE_300002">Shimmer Strike</LSTag> for [1] turns.
You dodge light and blend into obscurity, gaining <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HUNGRY_WIND_300003">Hungry Wind</LSTag> for [1] turns.
You dodge light and blend into obscurity, gaining <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CLOAK_OF_PAIN_300004">Cloak of Pain</LSTag> for [1] turns. Usable twice per long rest.
You take a shortcut through darkness and teleport instantly to the target location. Upon arrival, you create a [1] radius cloud of darkness that lasts for [2] turns.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Vicious_Trickery_C00001">Vicious Trickery</LSTag>. You crack open a vial of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLACK_LOTUS_DIPPED_200035">Black Lotus</LSTag> essence and coat your weapons with it. The coating persists for [1] turns.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Vicious_Trickery_C00001">Vicious Trickery</LSTag>. You feint at your target and hit it in the back. This always <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabs</LSTag>.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Vicious_Trickery_C00001">Vicious Trickery</LSTag>. You deliver a deadly strike to your target that ignores <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing and Piercing damage. On a <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstab</LSTag>, this also ignores <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag>.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Vicious_Trickery_C00001">Vicious Trickery</LSTag>. You hit your victim in the eye, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURGICAL_ASSAULT_BLINDED_200037">Blinding</LSTag> it for [1] turns if it fails a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. On a <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstab</LSTag>, you blind your target without a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> for [2] turns.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Murders_Art_C00003">Murder's Art</LSTag>. You shoot a powerful arrow from shadows. It deals an additionnal [1] damage as it pierces the heart of your target. On a <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstab</LSTag> and if your target has [2]% <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or less, you kill it instantly.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Murders_Art_C00003">Murder's Art</LSTag>. You curse a target with a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MARK_OF_DEATH_200042">Khainite Mark</LSTag> for [1] turns.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Murders_Art_C00003">Murder's Art</LSTag>. You unleash a dark blade, tearing through your surroundings in all directions. If used with your main hand, the blade travels fruther and thus affects a [1] area. If you use it with your offhand, it only affects a [2] area but it deals more damage. On <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabs</LSTag>, The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [3].
You instantly teleport back to your shadow and make it fade away.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Murders_Art_C00003">Murder's Art</LSTag>. You fade out of this world for [1] turns. You are invulnerable and cannot directly act but at the end of each turn you deliver [2] blows to enemies standing in the dark.
A cruel strike that deals an additional [1] damage.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Cautious_Subterfuge_C00002">Cautious Subterfuge</LSTag>. About to get damaged, Ladrielle veils you with an ominous mist, making you <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to all types of non-magical damage until the start of your next turn.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Cautious_Subterfuge_C00002">Cautious Subterfuge</LSTag>. Impose <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on an attacker and creates a fog cloud for 2 turn.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Cautious_Subterfuge_C00002">Cautious Subterfuge</LSTag>. You quickly respond to being damaged and blink in the back of your attacker.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Vicious_Trickery_C00001">Vicious Trickery</LSTag>. When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can retaliate with a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="KhainesHand_Retaliate_720002">Quick Stab</LSTag> that deals an additional [1] damage if you are wielding a melee weapon in your offhand.
Execute the action with your main hand melee weapon.
Execute the action with your offhand melee weapon.
Execute the action with your main hand ranged weapon.
Execute the action with your offhand ranged weapon.
Shades are marvelous murderers. When you attack a target from the back with a weapon, you deal [1] additionnal damage. Shade's unique actions have special effects when backstabbing.
You absorb the shadow of foes who fall under your strikes, which gives you <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> based on the health of foe you killed.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> saps their target's life to feed your inner shadow, granting you [1].

You're an innate master of dual-wielding. When you make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> with your offhand weapon, you can add your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Ability Modifier</LSTag> to the damage of the attack and the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [1].

Weakening your target grants you shadows's attention. When you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> a target or make it <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>, you regain [1] and gain [2].
Your <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> are even more lethal and deal an additionnal [1], [2], [3] or [4] piercing damage at random.

On hitting a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> target with a weapon attack, you apply [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HAEMORRHAGING_200013">Haemorrhaging</LSTag>.

You're a true predator, never letting your prey get away from you. You gain bonuses by attacking the same target, and each consecutive turn spent attacking the same victim increases the potency of these bonuses. The bonus resets instantly when you change target.

You're even more efficient at killing. The number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [1] while <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabbing</LSTag>. Additionnaly, your <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabs</LSTag> can now <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MURDEROUS_PROWESS_POISON_200022">poison</LSTag> their victim for [2] turns.
You are extremely evasive while obscured, increased your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1].
When you deal a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you gain [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLOOD_SHROUD_200024">Blood Shrouds</LSTag>.

You gain [1] more use of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Vicious_Trickery_C00001">Vicious Trickery</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Cautious_Subterfuge_C00002">Cautious Subterfuge</LSTag>. per short rest.

When you start your turn within melee range of a foe, your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1] and you do not provoke opportunity attacks when moving away from an enemy for [2] turns.

When you deal damage with a <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstab</LSTag>, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHAIN_KILLER_ACTIVATED_200027">Chain Killing</LSTag> for [1] turns.

The first time you kill a character with a <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstab</LSTag> each turn, you gain [1] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag> until the end of your turn.
The further your target is from where you started your turn, the more damage you inflict, up to a maximum of [1].
Affected entity must succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLACK_LOTUS_POISONED_200036">Poisoned</LSTag> for [1].

At the start of your turn, you leave a shadow of yourself in place for [1] turns. As long as the shadow exists, you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="UmbralBlade_Shadow_Recall_610001">teleport</LSTag> back to it. You can only have [2] shadow at any time.

You cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>. While lightly obscured, you receive a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>. While heavily obscured, you receive a +[2] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> and the number you need to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [3].
The angle required for you to backstab a target is wider.

You're a real master of dual wielding and thus are able to use Two-Weapon Fighting even if the weapons you are wielding aren't Light. You cannot dual-wield <LSTag Tooltip="Heavy">Heavy</LSTag> weapons. Furthermore, your offhand weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag> deal [1] bonus damage.

You slay more efficiently when using both hands the same amount. On main hand <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag> your next offhand <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> will have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RYTHMIC_MURDER_OFF_HAND_220002">bonuses</LSTag> while on offhand <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag> it is your next main hand <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> that will have <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RYTHMIC_MURDER_MAIN_HAND_220001">bonuses</LSTag>.
You've gone beyond your kind and the limits of your body. You can now use [1] <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Murders_Art_C00003">Murder's Arts</LSTag> per long rest.

You are invisible and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1]. You automatically <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabbing</LSTag> and deal an additionnal [2].
You are deeply cut and bleeding profusely. <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">Backstabbing</LSTag> attacks against you deal [1] additionnal Piercing or Slashing Damage.
You're being preyed upon by a Shade. When it targets you, it has a bonus of +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
You're being preyed upon by a Shade. When it targets you, it has a bonus of +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals an additionnal 1d6 damage.

You're being preyed upon by a Shade. When it targets you, it has a bonus of +[1] to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, deals an additionnal 2d4 damage and the number it needs to inflict a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [2].

You've been exposed to a powerful poison, reducing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1]. Each turn, you must success a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> to reduce the duration of this status by [2]. If you fail, you take [3].
You're very hard to hit in the dark, increasing your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmorClass">Armour Class</LSTag> by [1].
You take [1] less damage per blood shroud you have. When you suffer [2] damage or more at once, all blood shrouds vanish instantly.
You deal [1] additionnal damage with <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabs</LSTag>. This status is instantly removed on non-backstabbing attack.

You are invisible and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1]. You automatically <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabbing</LSTag> and deal an additionnal [2]. When this ends, you become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GREATER_INVISIBILITY">Invisible</LSTag> for [3].

You are invisible and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1]. You automatically <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabbing</LSTag> and deal an additionnal [2]. Furthermore, you can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Shadow_Stride_700001">teleport</LSTag> at will.

You are invisible and your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement speed</LSTag> is increased by [1]. You automatically <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabbing</LSTag> and deal an additionnal [2].

Deals an additionnal [1]. When an entity is damaged, it must succeed a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLACK_LOTUS_POISONED_200036">Poisoned</LSTag> for [2].
Takes [1] and can't take bonus actions.
You are shrouded by a mystic fog, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all types of non-magical damage.

You are marked by Khaine. All damage dealt to you by the spellcaster is stored. When it expires, all the stored damage is increased by [1]% and inflicted on you as Piercing damage. Damage dealt on <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Shade_Innate_Backstabbing_100001">backstabs</LSTag> counts for [2]% more.
You are completely with the shadows, untouchable, unreachable.

Resonating in harmony, your next main hand <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> deals an additionnal [1] and the number it needs to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [2].

Resonating in harmony, your next offhand <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag> deals an additionnal [1] and the number it needs to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">roll</LSTag> a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by [2].
Night gives you one of three gifts to protect you from harm.
The way your kind fulfil a mission is always the same: it is by killing, but each shade has his own unique style of execution.
As long as you live and make blood spill, Khaine will not allow your death.
Only the very best shades are such murderous machines, and only those have access to the legacy of their kind.
The first and most important skill of an assassin is stealth, and now you mastered it. This replace <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shade_Infiltrate_600001">Infiltrate</LSTag> with an upgraded version.
Invisibility ends early if the invisible entity attacks, casts another spell, takes an action, or takes damage.
Strikes are evenly distributed across all enemies standing in the dark. A single entity can be hit [1] times if it is the only valid target.
With both swords at hand, a Shade is always ready to satisfy Khaine's thirst with a glorious killing.
You can't use infiltrate again until <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Vicious trickeries are aggressive Shade-specific techniques. You can only use two of them per short rest.
Defensive actions usually used by Shades to avoid imminent demise. You can only use one of them per short rest.
Aces in the Shades arsenal, Murder's Art are powerful techniques only the very best can dare to try. You can only use one per long rest.
